issue.title: segmentation fault when run pa.Int16Value()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1155](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1155). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```Java
Python 2.7.12 (default, Oct 11 2016, 05:20:59)
[GCC 4.2.1 Compatible Apple LLVM 8.0.0 (clang-800.0.38)] on darwin
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import pyarrow as pa
>>> pa.Int16Value(1)
[1]    85521 segmentation fault  python
```

I understand this may be a misusage, but a segmentation fault is too unfriendly.
